text: Paul Christopher Neville (20 March 1940 - 1 January 2019) was an Australian politician. He was a member of the National Party. Neville was a member of the Australian House of Representatives from March 1993 to August 2013, representing the Division of Hinkler, Queensland. Neville died at a hospital in Bundaberg, Queensland on 1 January 2019 at the age of 78.Reid, Emma (1 January 2019) Tributes flow for former MP Paul Neville, NewsMail. Retrieved 1 January 2019. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Politicians from Queensland
title: Paul Neville (politician)
